If no folder ID is provided, it fetches content from the root folder.

actions.description: Lists all shared drives the user has access to. Returns paginated results with up to 100 drives per page.
actions.name: list-drives

actions.description:
Uploads a file to Google Drive. The file is uploaded to the root directory
of the authenticated user's Google Drive account. If a folder ID is provided,
the file is uploaded to the specified folder.
actions.name: upload-document

syncs.description:
Sync the metadata of a specified file or folders from Google Drive,
handling both individual files and nested folders.
Metadata required to filter on a particular folder, or file(s). Metadata
fields should be `{"files": ["<some-id>"]}` OR
`{"folders": ["<some-id>"]}`. The ID should be able to be provided
by using the Google Picker API
(https://developers.google.com/drive/picker/guides/overview)
and using the ID field provided by the response
(https://developers.google.com/drive/picker/reference/results)
syncs.name: documents

syncs.description: Sync the folders at the root level of a google drive.
syncs.name: folders

actions.description:
Creates a user in Jira. Note that this endpoint is marked as experimental and could 
be deprecated in the future. Products are optional and allowed params are
jira-core, jira-servicedesk, jira-product-discovery, jira-software. Defaults to 
jira-software. Note that the last name isn't able to be set via the API and 
the first name defaults to the email address.
actions.name: create-user

actions.description:
Create a new row in a specified Notion database. 
The properties are mapped to Notion-compatible formats based on the database schema. 
Supported property types include:
- `title` (string): Creates a title property.
- `select` (string): Creates a select property.
- `multi_select` (array of strings): Creates a multi-select property.
- `status` (string): Creates a status property.
- `date` (string or object): Supports ISO date strings or objects with a `start` field.
- `checkbox` (boolean): Creates a checkbox property.
- `number` (number): Creates a number property.
- `url` (string): Creates a URL property.
- `email` (string): Creates an email property.
- `phone_number` (string): Creates a phone number property.
- `rich_text` (string): Creates a rich text property.
- `relation` (array of IDs): Creates a relation property.
actions.name: create-database-row

actions.description: Updates a channel's description or purpose.
actions.name: set-channel-purpose

actions.description: Updates a channel's topic.
actions.name: set-channel-topic

actions.description: Sets the calling user's manual presence status.
actions.name: set-user-presence

actions.description: Restores an archived conversation.
actions.name: unarchive-channel

actions.description: Removes a pinned item from a channel.
actions.name: unpin-message

actions.description: Modifies an existing message in a channel.
actions.name: update-message

syncs.description:
Syncs information about all Slack channels. Which channels get synced
(public, private, IMs, group DMs) depends on the scopes. If
joinPublicChannels is set to true, the bot will automatically join all
public channels as well. Scopes: At least one of channels:read,
groups:read, mpim:read, im:read. To also join public channels:
channels:join
syncs.name: channels

syncs.description:
Syncs Slack messages, thread replies and reactions from messages &
thread replies for all channels, group dms and dms the bot is a part
of. For every channel it will do an initial full sync on first
detection of the channel. For subsequent runs it will sync messages,
threads & reactions from the last 10 days. Scopes required:
channels:read, and at least one of
channels:history, groups:history, mpim:history, im:history
syncs.name: messages

syncs.description: Syncs information about all Users on the Slack workspace
syncs.name: users

actions.description: Creates a user in Smartsheet
actions.name: create-user

actions.description: Deletes a user from Smartsheet. User is transitioned to a free collaborator with read-only access to owned reports, sheets, Sights, workspaces, and any shared templates (unless those are optionally transferred to another user).
actions.name: delete-user

actions.description: Disables a user in an organization account. User will no longer be able to access Smartsheet in any way. User's assets will continue to be owned by this user until they are transferred to another user.
actions.name: disable-user

syncs.description: Fetches a list of users from Smartsheet
syncs.name: users

syncs.name: subscriptions

syncs.description: Fetch all employees from UKG Ready and maps them to the standard HRIS model
syncs.name: unified-employees

Create an opportunity in the system. Requires a stage that exists
in the system. Use the list-stages action to find the appropriate stage.

List all the stages that exist in the system. Use this action to find
the correct stage to be able to create an opportunity.
actions.name: list-stages

actions.description: Update a lead with any changed information about the federal agency, the name, due date, posted date, solicitation number, naics category or categories, the city, state, country, and description.

actions.description:
Creates one or multiple contacts in Xero.
Note: Does NOT check if these contacts already exist.
actions.name: create-contact

actions.description:
Creates one or more credit notes in Xero.
Note: Does NOT check if the credit note already exists.
actions.name: create-credit-note

actions.description:
Creates one or more invoices in Xero.
Note: Does NOT check if the invoice already exists.
actions.name: create-invoice

actions.description:
Creates one or more items in Xero.
Note: Does NOT check if the item already exists.
actions.name: create-item

actions.description:
Creates one or more payments in Xero.
Note: Does NOT check if the payment already exists.
actions.name: create-payment

actions.description:
Fetches all the tenants the connection has access to.
This can be used to set the metadata to the selected tenant.
actions.name: get-tenants

actions.description: Updates one or multiple contacts in Xero. Only fields that are passed in are modified. If a field should not be changed, omit it in the input. The id field is mandatory.
actions.name: update-contact

actions.description: Updates one or more credit notes in Xero.
actions.name: update-credit-note

actions.description:
Updates one or more invoices in Xero. To delete an invoice
that is in DRAFT or SUBMITTED set the status to DELETED. If an
invoice has been AUTHORISED it can't be deleted but you can set
the status to VOIDED.
actions.name: update-invoice

actions.description: Updates one or more items in Xero.
actions.name: update-item

syncs.description: Fetches all accounts in Xero (chart of accounts). Incremental sync, detects deletes, metadata is not required.
syncs.name: accounts

syncs.description: Fetches all bank transactions in Xero. Incremental sync, detects deletes, metadata is not required.
syncs.name: bank-transactions

syncs.description:
Fetches all Xero contacts.
Details: incremental sync, detects deletes, metadata is not required.
syncs.name: contacts

syncs.description: Fetches all credit notes in Xero. Incremental sync.
syncs.name: credit-notes

syncs.description: Fetch all general ledger entries in Xero
syncs.name: general-ledger

syncs.description: Fetches all invoices in Xero. Incremental sync.
syncs.name: invoices

syncs.description:
Fetches all items in Xero. Incremental sync, does not detect deletes, metadata is not
required.
syncs.name: items

syncs.description: Fetches organisation details in Xero.
syncs.name: organisations

syncs.description: Fetches all payments in Xero. Incremental sync.
syncs.name: payments
